cast.name: 理查德·赫尔姆斯 Richard Holmes

writer.name: 理查德·赫尔姆斯 Richard Holmes

introduction: The Making of a ManHistorian Robert Holmes attempts to uncover the real Wellington and find out what changed a shy boy from Ireland into one of the greatest generals in British history.A Thirst for ReputationRichard Holmes discovers Wellington's overwhelming desire to become a great military leader, and his tactics on the Iberian peninsular that won him his title.From Soldier to StatesmanRichard Holmes examines Wellington's absolute victory over Napoleon at Waterloo and his subsequent and troubled political career as British Prime Minister.
